node.display_long_description:
“《SUPERHOT VR》让人无法自拔”- Polygon

屡获殊荣且大受欢迎的《SUPERHOT VR》将谨慎的战略和放纵的厮杀合而为一，给你带来最完整的VR动作游戏体验。只有你移动，时间才会流动。

没有再生的生命条，也没有预先放置的弹药掉落。你孤身一人，势单力薄，弹尽粮绝。唯有抓起敌人掉落的武器进行厮杀和射击，操纵时间躲过枪林弹雨。 
 
你从未玩过这样的游戏，这游戏有些不同之处。真实被抛诸脑后。 

深受无数玩家喜爱，经过进一步打磨的不朽之作，Quest推出最完整的《SUPERHOT VR》体验。 

呕心沥血重新打造出原汁原味的风貌。不受任何干扰，全神贯注于《SUPERHOT》招牌慢动作战斗的猛烈攻势。关卡中的金字塔都消失了。如同跳着死亡之舞的舞者，在动作间不受阻碍地流动。 

不受拘束，也不妥协。 

大脑是软件
现在你自由了。

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
// SUPERHOT VR on Oculus Quest v1.13
> Fixed few leaderboard and scoring system issues

// SUPERHOT VR on Oculus Quest v1.126
> Hotfix for vanishing floppy disks in save slot 2 and 3 under certain conditions

// SUPERHOT VR on Oculus Quest v1.125

A gift from us, to you, with love! This free, surprise “Boxing Day” update introduces an all-new holiday-themed game mode, a brand new endless level, a new scoring system, and a suitably festive soundtrack!

The Boxing Day update also features an exclusive leaderboard to show off your holiday survival skills. Get points for punching, dodging, headshots, style shots, and much more - and see how you stack up against your friends and enemies! 

After completing SUPERHOT VR, players can access the new Boxing Day content by loading the Endless floppy disk in the Hacker Room and selecting the Christmas Tree.  

We’re also adding support for Oculus Challenges on Quest. Via the Oculus Scoreboard app, you can now create mini-tournaments for friends and fellow players based around the Boxing Day update and the existing Endless levels. 

The SUPERHOT Team sincerely wishes everyone a most excellent and triumphant 2021 <3

// Bugs & Improvements & Updates

> Added new Boxing Day content 
> Added new leaderboard functionality
> Support for Oculus Challenges on Quest
> Support for Oculus Destinations on Quest
> New in-game menu replacing the existing piOS BIOS menu at startup, allowing you to now change settings during gameplay
> Menu settings now have previews & clearer descriptions
> Removed “exit guest” mode pyramids - you can now exit from the in-game menu instead
> Fixed bullets occasionally passing through weapons
> Fixed broken floppy disk grab sound in 4th Hacker Room
> Fixed broken Hacker Room videos
> Various other minor bug fixes 
> Additional performance improvements

nodes.title: Happy Holidays!
nodes.body_text:
Hello there friends,

We just wanted to say a quick hello and that we hope you are having a truly happy holiday. To those players who just got SUPERHOT VR, we do hope you enjoy it!

2020 was a crazy year for us. While we were all working from home, we released a big update with full support SUPERHOT VR on Quest 2. We then released the holiday-themed Boxing Day update in early December.

This was the first new content we released in a loooooong time. The response from players was thankfully great. We couldn’t be happier. Go play it! Load the Endless floppy disk in the Hacker Room and select the Christmas Tree.

Once again, thank you for playing our games. Our community has always been superb. You supported us and gave us the strength to push through 2020. Please come say hi on Discord anytime: discord.gg/h7bBaCu

Be excellent to each other, have a most fantastic 2021.

Happy Holidays,
SUPERHOT Team

nodes.title: New Mode Out Now! Boxing Day Update is Live!
nodes.body_text:
Hi!

After a wild 2020 here’s a little gift from us, to you, with love! The free, surprise “Boxing Day” update features an all-new holiday-themed game mode. It's out now! Festive fun for all!



This mini-update features a brand-new Endless level, a new scoring system, and a suitably festive soundtrack.

The Boxing Day update also features an exclusive leaderboard to show off your holiday survival skills. Get points for punching, dodging, headshots, style shots, and much more - and see how you stack up against your friends and enemies!

After completing SUPERHOT VR, players can access the new Boxing Day content by loading the Endless floppy disk in the Hacker Room and selecting the Christmas Tree.

SUPERHOT VR on Quest now also supports Oculus Challenges! From the Oculus Scoreboards app, you can create your own Challenges or compete against others for the highest scores on Endless levels.

This latest update also delivers another load of bug fixes and an improved menu. See the Release Notes for further details.

Finally, thank you again for being a continuously awesome community. Everyone at SUPERHOT sincerely wishes you a most excellent and triumphant 2021 ❤.

Happy Holidays,
SUPERHOT Team

node.reviewDescription: Don’t let anyone tell you it’s short. The game, while it only does last about 3 hours of main gameplay (maybe even 2) there is a lot you can do afterwards. You can simple replay the game, try to speed run and beat you previous times in a real time speed run and a game time speed run. game time is required more strategy and real time relies on more movement and less strategy. Speed runs not for you? Try out the more challenging modes of the original game, such as hardcore, where time is always moving slowly, guns only have 1 bullet, and all items break on impact (excluding melee weapons I think). This game was AMAZING and sooooo worth the money. Honestly, just buy it.
node.reviewTitle: Don’t let anyone tell you that it’s shor

website_page_meta.description:
《SUPERHOT VR》 这款主视角射击游戏，打通了小心谋划策略与大胆搏杀进击之间的界限。在游戏中，人前进时，时间才前进。



“《SUPERHOT VR》让你感到热血沸腾” 
- Polygon

“就像一场美妙的死亡芭蕾” 
- Gamespot


赢得了数十项年度虚拟现实游戏大奖，成为了PC和主机的VR游戏典型，《SUPERHOT VR》现已为Oculus Quest精心重制。这是史上最好的《SUPERHOT》了。

没有缆绳，没有限制，没有妥协。
让系统释放你的自由。
